## MapOptions.create property

–êutomatic creation of a map from the constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create?: boolean;
```

## Example


```javascript
const webMap = new WebMap(options);
// create: false
webMap.create().then(() => doSomething());
// create: true
webMap.emitter.on('created', () => doSomething());

```
